question: On which date, the 2019 International Day of Solidarity with Detained and Missing Staff Members is observed recently?
explanation: The International Day of Solidarity with Detained and Missing Staff Members is observed every year on 25th of March by United Nations  to mobilize action, demand justice and strengthen resolve to protect UN staff and peacekeepers, as well as colleagues in the non-governmental community and the press. The day commemorates the anniversary of the abduction of Alec Collett, a former journalist who was working for the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees (UNRWA) when he was kidnapped by armed gunman in 1985. His body was finally found in the Bekaa Valley, Lebanon in 2009.
